actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide certain restrictions on the aircraft noise of supersonic aircraft.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Aviation Agency to prescribe standards for the control of aircraft noise and sonic boom. Stipulates that such standards shall require the same decible level for supersonic aircraft as for other aircraft.

titles.title: A bill to provide certain restrictions on the aircraft noise of supersonic aircraft.
